body.p: These are some of the sites that were created using Apache Forrest technology.
If you want your site added to the list, then please send a request to the mailing lists or to the Issue tracker. Tell us the URL, Name, and catch-phrase.

section.title: Skinned Sites
section.p: These sites use the skinning system that was part of all releases up to and including 0.7 release. This system is expected to be deprecated soon in favour of a more flexible system called Dispatcher. See the next section for some examples of such sites.

ul.li: Anteater - Ant-based functional testing
Chaperon - text parser
Some Apache Committer personal pages
Apache FOP (Formatting Objects Processor)
Dream Models - gather information about electric radio controlled helicopters
Apache Stats (Vadim's Home Page) - some web statistics
XFP - eXtensible Filtering Pipelines
phpOpenTracker - A framework solution for the analysis of website traffic and visitor analysis
Apache WSIF Project - Web Services Invocation Framework
Apache XMLBeans - An XML-Java binding tool
Druid: The Database Manager - GUI tool to create databases (GPL)
Apache Axis - an implementation of the SOAP ("Simple Object Access Protocol")
Apache SOAP - an implementation of the SOAP submission
Kanaputs - an interpreter for Java
Cell Electrophysiology Simulation Environment (CESE) - a framework for computational electrophysiological simulations
Learn Linux - developing Free/Open Source GNU/Linux Training Materials
Computer Dictionary Project - develop a DocBook XML computer nomenclature glossary database
Apache Derby - a zero admin, embeddable java rdbms
ATbyMJM - Assistive Technology, using augmentive communication devices, by Martha Jane McLellan
CCCP Common Clan Portal - Primarily a J2EE website application for game clans
Sello Propio - Feng Shui in Columbia
Sámi terminology portal - (background documentation uses Forrest, the main page uses eXist+Cocoon)
DisCountDracula - bargains/deals on various products and services

Central Florida Astronomical Society - The Central Florida Astronomical Society, Inc. (CFAS) is a 501(c)(3) organization operating in the Greater Orlando Metropolitan area and surrounding communities.
uml2svg - an XSLT-based tool for converting XMI-compliant UML Diagrams into SVG
technicat - consulting and development expertise to the Internet, educational software, computer graphics and video game industries
OpenICDL - training materials for International Computer Driving License certification
The Summit Journal - A global, free, translated and syndicated Adventure and Exploration publication.
X'Prime - Software company specialising in optimisation techniques using evolutionary algorithms
Snjezana Vidovic - Art Painter - Virtual Gallery
j2world - smart solutions for a mobile world
Java Workshop online web book - show cases some of the tools that every java developer should have in his / her toolbox
Die Krabbelkäfer - homepage of the association for the promotion of child care in Usingen (Germany).
Produktkatalog for Sølvkroken - biggest supplier of sports fishing equipment in Norway, with export all over the world.
Design Patterns - GoF Design Patterns Tutorial
Generic Domain Names - Domain sales site specialising in industrial, business and home themed generic domains.
travel visas - travel information for backpackers and other travellers in Europe and beyond
XMLMath - XML-Based Mathematical Expression Evaluator
Globalization Tool Kit - Introduction to the G11NToolKit.
Barcode4J - a flexible generator for barcodes written in Java.
Maemo - open development platform to create applications for Nokia 770 Internet Tablet and other maemo compliant handheld devices in the future.
Xholon - A Java framework for developing UML 2.0 and other event-driven systems.
Cellontro - Modeling and simulation of cells, other biological entities, and biochemical networks, using Xholon.
ER/Box Site An all Java, open source ERP system built on Compiere and Apache Derby. Some customisations have been documented.
Apparatus Framework - An object-oriented software framework written in C++ for embedded applications.
Skiclub Troisdorf-Sieglar e.V. The skiclub aims to provide ski related activities and social events for our members in and around Troisdorf area (near Cologne and Bonn).
Scriptella ETL Open source ETL (Extract-Transform-Load) and script execution tool.
open.controltier.com Open Source tools for automating the build and deployment of complex applications.
antdepo.org Open Source automation harness built on top of Apache Ant

section.title: Sites using upcoming Dispatcher
section.p: The skinning system in versions of Forrest up to and including 0.7 was great, however, it proved to be too inflexible. Soon we will have brand new system called Dispatcher. The following sites are examples.
section.note: The Dispatcher is still in development (as of 0.8-dev cycle), please only use them if you know what you are doing. We expect to include them in an upcoming release at which point we will be encouraging their use.

ul.li: Floating Sun - Diwaker Gupta :: Web/Blog/Gallery
Our Little Stars - A non-profit toy library site. This site is interesting because it pulls content from many locations including a Daisy CMS system and the Amazon ECS service.
Cyriaque family website...
Apache Lenya Zone - this site is using v2 with some nice demonstrations of new features like the theme switcher.
tarGET-X - know the unknown by thorsten.
CDK - club deportivo kriaturitas. Website of the basketball club CDK located in Sevilla, España.
